mapper.sql: ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, JQBH, AJBH, AUTHOR, AUTHORIDCARD, BATCHESSEQ, ISFINAL,CASEINFOID,SFCNUMBER,ARCHIVETYPE,ARCHIVENAME,ARCHIVESFCID, AUTHORID,PREVID,BASERECORDID,ISACTIVE
mapper.insert:
select seq_FUN_ARCHIVE_SEQ_id.nextval from dual
insert into FUN_ARCHIVE_SEQ
ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, JQBH, AJBH, CASEINFOID, AUTHOR, AUTHORIDCARD, SFCNUMBER, ARCHIVETYPE, ARCHIVENAME, ARCHIVESFCID, AUTHORID, BASERECORDID, ISACTIVE,
BATCHESSEQ,
ISFINAL,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 0, 0, sysdate, sysdate, #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CASEINFOID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authoridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfcnumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{archivetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{archivename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archivesfcid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{authorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{baserecordid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isactive,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{batchesseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{isfinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update FUN_ARCHIVE_SEQ
SCBJ = #{scbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JQBH = #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AJBH = #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHOR = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHORIDCARD = #{authoridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BATCHESSEQ = #{batchesseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISFINAL = #{isfinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISACTIVE = #{isactive,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select nvl(max(BATCHESSEQ),0) from FUN_ARCHIVE_SEQ where scbj=0 and CASEINFOID=#{caseinfoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT from FUN_ARCHIVE_SEQ where scbj=0 AND archivesfcid= ( SELECT ID FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC WHERE SCBJ=0 AND ARCHIVETYPE=0 AND PEOPLECASEID=#{peoplecaseid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ) AND PREVID=0

SELECT
FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_SEQ WHERE scbj=0 AND archivetype=0 AND caseinfoid=#{caseinfoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ISACTIVE = 1 AND ROWNUM=1
